document_title: Rupture of blood vessels in the brain: Signs, causes, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: vo-mach-mau-nao.json_6_How to prevent cerebral vascular rupture
subsection_content:
To prevent rupture of blood vessels in the brain leading to stroke, preventive measures can be taken such as:
Exercise regularly, at least 2-3 times/week for at least 30 minutes each time; Maintain a healthy diet, limit salty foods, foods containing saturated fat and cholesterol. Eat lots of vegetables and fruits.; Do not smoke, limit alcohol consumption; Maintain blood pressure at a stable level; Get reasonable rest, get enough sleep 7-8 hours a day, avoid excessive stress.; Proactively examine and screen for neurological diseases.
